text:
Hey Doug, i'm going to put some non-critical questions here for when you return :smile:. Response not needed anytime soon:
1) Why was `make collect-static` necessary to run the sources app locally? Before running that command, anything on port 4000 was returning Error 404. I noticed it created some untracked files in my local repo:
```
koku/static/openapi.532dfaae7187.json
	koku/static/openapi.532dfaae7187.json.gz
	koku/static/openapi.json
	koku/static/openapi.json.gz
	koku/static/rest_framework/
	koku/static/staticfiles.json
```
When should I update/delete these files? Are you locally ignoring them in your global .gitignore?
